files.patch:
@@ -225,1 +225,0 @@
-        {"No modules specified.", "No modules specified."},
@@ -481,0 +480,1 @@
+             "    -R<option>        Forward <option> to debuggee process\n" +
@@ -482,1 +482,1 @@
-             "options forwarded to debuggee process:\n" +
+             "options forwarded to debuggee process (shorthand instead of using -R):\n" +
@@ -489,3 +489,0 @@
-             "    --add-modules <module name>[,<module name>...]\n" +
-             "                      root modules to resolve in addition to the initial module\n" +
-             "    --enable-preview  allow debuggee to depend on preview features of this release\n" +

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2001, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2001, 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -225,1 +225,0 @@
-        {"No modules specified.", "No modules specified."},

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2001, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2001, 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -225,1 +225,0 @@
-        {"No modules specified.", "No modules specified."},

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2020, 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2020, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -154,0 +154,16 @@
+        // -R is tested to see if options are passed through.
+        test("-R-Dprop1=val1",
+                "-R-Dprop2=val 2",
+                "-R-Xmixed",
+                "-R--add-modules", "-Rjdk.attach",
+                "-R-Xcheck:jni",
+                "-R--enable-preview",
+                "-connect",
+                "com.sun.jdi.CommandLineLaunch:vmexec=java,main=" + targ + " " + outFilename + " prop1 prop2")
+                .expectedProp("prop1", "val1")
+                .expectedProp("prop2", "val 2")
+                .expectedArg("-Xmixed")
+                .expectedArg("--add-modules=jdk.attach")
+                .expectedArg("-Xcheck:jni")
+                .expectedArg("--enable-preview");
+
